public class PlayerController
extends CreatureController<Player>

This class is for controlling players.

Author:

startProtectionActiveTask

public void startProtectionActiveTask()
After entering game player char is "blinking" which means that it's in under some protection, after making an action char stops blinking. - Starts protection active - Schedules task to end protection

stopProtectionActiveTask

public void stopProtectionActiveTask()
Stops protection active task after first move or use skill
